entries.content:
Session started with Moti. Refreshed memory on Sementix project:
- Recent work: Ultra-modular refactoring across multiple components (MCP client, UserProject, message handlers)
- Architecture: Following orchestrator + micro-components pattern with DI
- Core features: Real-time streaming UI, permission system, multi-state architecture, semantic memory
- Tech stack: VS Code extension with React UI, FastAPI backend (semantix-brain), event-driven architecture
- Current state: Multiple modified files in git status related to UI indicators and template management

User wants to extract 8 text effects from text-temp/texts.html into separate HTML/CSS files in a new text-loaders folder. Each effect should be isolated (no background/card styling, just the text animation itself).

Successfully extracted all 8 text effects from texts.html into modular components in text-temp/text-loaders/. Each effect now has its own folder with isolated HTML + CSS files (no backgrounds/cards, just pure text animations). Includes text rotation JavaScript for dynamic content.

User wants 4 more unique creative text effects added to the text-loaders collection. Planning new effects that are visually distinct from existing 8 (typewriter, glitch, wave, matrix, morph, flip-3d, shimmer, quantum).

Added 4 new creative text effects to the collection: 9-pulse (heartbeat rhythm), 10-neon-flicker (vintage neon sign), 11-liquid-ripple (fluid wave distortion), 12-holo-scan (rainbow chromatic hologram). Total now 12 unique text animation effects.
User loved the 4 new text effects! Successfully created a collection of 12 unique, creative text animations that are modular and ready for integration into Sementix UI.
